Articles.Content:
No, manually means manually ie.NO HYPEREDIT!

Ok, I think there's been a misunderstanding here. Hyperedit is only really allowed when you are placing your fleets into orbit at the start. However, all other moves must be done without the assistance of mods? Am I correct?

I know for a fact I did all my moves legit, but they took forever to do.
Correct, it was worse when I didn't know about hyperedit:P
Ok I thought we could Hyperedit them, since your ships have all the fuel, but that is probably a save problem.

Guess who was suppost to be doing school work but ended up being distracted with a new project?

Guess who just made a replica for the Suestra Command Cruiser so that Macey Dean Fans can download it?

Guess who is incredibly pissed off at this ship because it took me 3 hours to make

Guess who wants nothing more than to watch this ship burn up in Kerbol

Guess who is angry at Macey Dean for not providing a link for hanland's fleet (Macey, if you read this, your awesome but really you should have done that)

I ll give y'all 3 guess

Now, who wants this ship?

I hated doing this ship with a passion.

Please don't let my hard work and frustration go to waste. Download the crap out of this ship. Tell all your friend to download the crap out of this ship

Now if you excuse me, I am going to put a few in orbit and put a few rounds of SRB's into them

http://www./view/cvl7i8sn7d5h7vf/Suestra_command_cruiser.craft

Only one ship left. Who wants to do the Thor Class. I aint touching that one

Edited April 19, 2014 by War Eagle 1
I'm on it.
People underestimate the power of 1-meter/1.25-meter missiles. I have missiles that are 1-m/1.25-m that are ship-killers, and I have yet to see armor that can bounce them.

People underestimate the power of 1-meter/1.25-meter missiles. I have missiles that are 1-m/1.25-m that are ship-killers, and I have yet to see armor that can bounce them.

I use .5m ship killers. lol

I use .5m ship killers. lol

I'm pretty sure even my ships can bounce .5m's.

Project Firehawk is finished. Project Firehawk is a project to make a carrier-based fighter. The Stygian, the result of this project, will go up tomorrow. I need to get some sleep.
